Class VirtualMachineState

java.lang.Object
VirtualMachineState
public class VirtualMachineState
extends java.lang.Object
virtual machine state (registers, memory, stack etc.)

    • VirtualMachineState

      public VirtualMachineState​(Assembler.Assembled code, Disassembler disassembler, java.util.Optional<Events.ViewForModel> view)
      constructor from code, disassembler to decode instruction and event handler for view
      Parameters:
      code - assembled code from editor
      disassembler - disassembler object from model
      view - event handlers from view to update screen and ui
